Your servitor is eligible to receive the supplemental magic listed below. These spells do not benefit pets. Eligibility is determined by the master's level.

Horn Melody / Drum Melody / Pipe Organ Melody Guitar Melody / Harp Melody / Lute Melody Prevailing Sonata / Daring Sonata Refreshing Sonata
